document_data.name: Targor Bloodsword
document_data.mainbody: '''Targor Bloodsword''' was the ambitious leader of a [[goblinoid]] war band of the [[Cragmaw tribe]].
document_data.Description: Targor led three other [[hobgoblin]]s and a pair of [[wolves]] in his contingent. He was by far the most powerful of the band, being a very robust one of his kind.
document_data.Personality: The strong hobgoblin had long wished to overtake King [[Grol]] as the leader of the entire Cragmaw tribe. Given the opportunity, Targor was ready to take it.
document_data.History: In [[1491 DR]],{{Phandelver-time}} Targor and his contingent set out of [[Cragmaw Castle]]. They encountered a hunting party of up to four [[elves]], and were successful in slaying them. The hobgoblins severed the heads of the elves, and shoved them into bags.
